rules: HOST: Free if client spends over $12,500 annually; otherwise $3,500.
Exceptions may be approved by the President if the event benefits the Ateema brand or fulfills a strategic need.
ATTEND: Every client receives two invitations to each networking event as added value; no additional discounts apply beyond this benefit.

sales_strategy: Typically we have at least 10 events per year. Use this dollar amount to show the overall financial value for the event on recommendations. For those who attend the events: we build the right relationships and database, create invitations, get the right audience in the room, do check-in, manage the event, provide food and drinks, etc. A client can meet just 1 concierge, or planner and make more then the cost of the clients overall investment with us in just one year. Where else can the client get this access?
product_description:
Concierge Networking Events
Bring together Chicago’s concierge and guest services professionals to show off your business and all of your offerings.
Your business is responsible for providing quality food & beverages while putting a spotlight on your venue’s unique offerings. Ateema will market the event and register attendees.
